verses.content: Aw LALPA kuomah lâwmthu hril ro, ama chu a ṭha sih a; A ngilneina khawm kumkhuoin a um ding a ni sih a,
LALPA mi intlanhai chun chuong ang chun hril raw se, Dotu kuta inthawka a întlan,
Ram tina inthawka a ṭhuoi khâwm, Sak le thlang, sim le hmâra inthawkhai dâm chun.
Thlalêra ram ṭâwl lampuia chun an invâk an invâk a, Mihriem umna khuo hrim hrim an hmu nawh a.
Phîngṭâm le dangchârin, An hringna chu an sûngah a chau tah a.
Chu phingleh an buoinaa chun LALPA chu an ko tah a, Ama chun an lunginzîngnaa inthawk chun a sanhim a.
Mihriem umna khuoa an fe theina dingin, Lampui tlûntakah a ṭhuoi tah a.
Aw, mihriemhai hin LALPA chu a ngilneina lei le, Mihriem nauhai chunga a thilmak thawhai lei hin inpâk hai sien aw!
Ama chun hringna thil châk êm êm chu a sukkhawpin, Hringna phîngṭâm chu ṭhatnain a sukkhawp sih a.
Inthim hnuoia le thina hlima ṭhung a, Rinumna le thîra khuophai chu;
Pathien thuhai chungah an hel a, Achunghnungtak remruot chu an ngainêp leiin.
Ama chun an lungril chu inrimnain a sukhnuoi a, An tluh a, ṭhangpuitu ding hrim an um si nawh a.
Chu phingleh an buoinaa chun LALPA chu an ko a, Ama chun an lungzîngnaa inthawk chun a sandam a.
Inthim hnuoi le thina hlima inthawk chun a ṭhuoi suok a, An khuopnahai chu a suktan tah a.
Aw mihriemhai hin LALPA chu a ngilneina lei le, Mihriem nauhai chunga a thilmak thawhai lei hin inpâk hai sien aw!
Ama chun dâr kawtkhârhai chu a suksiet a, A kalna thîrtluonhai chu a sukbawng ta sih a.
Mi invêthai chu an bawsietna lei le, An rîtlonahai leiin an insukrinum hlak a.
An hringna chun fâk ding tinrêng hi a tirdak hlak a, Thina kul kawtkhârhai chu an hnai hlak a.
Chu phingleh an buoinaa chun LALPA chu an ko a, Ama chun an lungzingnaa inthawk chun a sandam hlak.
A thu chu a tirsuok a, anni chu a sukdam hlak a, An bohmangna dinghaia inthawk chun a sanhim hlak.
Aw mihriemhai hin LALPA chu a ngilneina lei le, Mihriem nauhai chunga a thilmak thawhai lei hin inpâk hai sien chu aw!
Anni chun lâwmthu hrilna inthâwinahai chu inhlân hai sienla, A thilthawhai chu hlaa sakin hril raw hai se.
Tuisuorieta lawng liena zu feh a, Tui lientak chunghaia sin thaw hlakhai chun,
Chuonghai chun LALPA thilthawhai le, Tui inthûktaka a thilmak thawhai chu an hmu hlak.
Ama chun thu a pêk a, thlipui ân hrângtir a, Chu chun a tuifâwnhai chu a suksâng hlak.
Vân tieng an hung tuol tuol a, inthûktakah an ṭum nâwk tuol tuol hlak, Lunginzîngna leiin an hringna chu ân tuihmang hlak.
Zurui angin an thle an thleh a, an pêm nawk nawk hlak a, Um ngaina hrim hrim an hriet ngai nawh.
Chu phingleh an buoinaa chun LALPA chu an ko a, Ama chun an lungzîngnaa inthawk chun a ṭhuoi suok hlak.
Thlipui chu a sukma ṭhuop a, Chuongchun, a tuifâwnhai a re ṭhup hlak.
Chun, a re ta leiin an lâwm hlak a; Chuongchun, ama chun an ngaitak likilkawia chun a ṭhuoi tlung hlak.
Aw, mihriemhai hin LALPA chu a zainêmna lei le Mihriem nauhai chunga a thilmak thawhai lei hin inpâk hai sien chu aw!
Anni chun mihai inkhâwmnaah ama chu inpâk sienla, Upahai ṭhungnaa chun inpâk raw se.
Ama chun vadungpuihai chu thlalêrah ân changtir hlak a, Tuihnârhai chu hnuoi ṭâwlah ân changtir bawk hlak.
Ram ṭha chu ram ṭâwl chawkah ân changtir hlak a, A sûnga umhai rîtlona leiin.
Thlalêr chu dîlah ân changtir hlak a, Ram ṭâwl chu tuihnârahai ân changtir bawk hlak.
Chutaka chun phîngṭâmhai chu ân umtir hlak a, Umna ding khuo an buotsai a.
Lohai an nei a, grêp huonhai an siem a, A ra hung punghai chu an hmu theina dingin.
Anni chu mal a sâwm hlak a, nasataka sukpungin an um a, An ranhai chu a kiem a phal ngai nawh a,
Chun, nêksâwrna dâm, rinum- na dâm, lungngai dâm leiin, An kiem ta sawt sawt a, an kûn ta thlawk thlawk a.
Ama chun mi lienhai chungah hmusitna a bunthlâk hlak a, Thlalêr lampui hrim hrim um nawnaa chun ân vâktir ân vâktir a.
Nisienlakhawm, rimsihai chu rinumnaa inthawkin hmun insângah a dawm kai hlak a, Ran ruol angin sûnghai a siempêk hlak.
Mi indiktakhai chun chu chu hmûng an ta, lâwm an tih, Rîtlona po po chun a bau hip a tih,
Tukhawm a var taphawt chun chuong chu vawng ṭhâng an ta, LALPA ngilneina chu ngaituong an tih.
